protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: This alpha-adrenergic receptor mediates its action by association with G proteins that activate a phosphatidylinositol- calcium second messenger system. Its effect is mediated by G(q) and G(11) proteins

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
